short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An editor to save and retrieve data from IndexedDB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wish Text Editor

Save, edit, and organize your wish texts effortlessly with Wish Text Editor. This versatile and user-friendly extension is designed to make it incredibly simple to manage all your wish texts and other text snippets directly within your browser.

Key Features and Benefits:

Intuitive Interface: Designed for ease of use, allowing users of all technical levels to save and manage their texts effortlessly.
Organize Your Thoughts: Keep all your important wishes, notes, and ideas neatly organized and easily accessible.
Quick Access: Access your texts directly from the browser toolbar, saving time and enhancing productivity.
Edit and Update: Modify your saved texts anytime to keep them up to date.
Secure Backup and Restore: Export your texts to a JSON file for safe backup, and restore them whenever needed.
Security Features:

Local Storage: All data is stored locally within the user's browser, maintaining privacy and security.
User Control: Users have full control over their data, with no external service storing or accessing their texts.
Minimal Permissions: Only necessary permissions are requested, ensuring a secure and trustworthy extension.
Abilities:

Save Texts: Quickly save any wish or text snippet with ease.
Backup and Restore: Export your data to a JSON file for backup and import it to restore whenever needed.
User-Friendly Interface: An easy-to-use interface designed for seamless interaction and enhanced user experience.
Organize and Sort: Categorize and sort your texts to keep them well-organized and easily accessible.

With Wish Text Editor, you can take control of your wish texts and notes, ensuring they are always organized, secure, and at your fingertips. Ideal for managing wish lists, to-do lists, notes, ideas, and more, this extension is a must-have tool for anyone looking to streamline their text management within their browser.
